SEARCH
Package org.hrw.infrastructure.anchor

Class AnchorService

java.lang.Object
org.hrw.infrastructure.anchor.AnchorService
public class AnchorService extends Object
Service responsible for anchoring Merkle root hashes in the Waves blockchain.

The service creates and broadcasts DataTransaction entries containing the root hash and timestamp provided by HashRecord. Each hash entry is written to the blockchain as a StringEntry for later verification.

This class is constructed through AnchorService.AnchorServiceBuilder to ensure proper configuration of private key, node connection and chain ID.
